main.name: Lyn Charisse Salig
main.description: A dedicated technology enthusiast eager to fully harness the power of full stack development and make a meaningful impact in the digital domain.
main.bio: As a student pursuing a career in software engineering, my objective is to immerse myself in the world of technology and become a proficient software engineer. I am driven by a genuine passion for creating innovative solutions and pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the digital realm. With a solid foundation in computer science and a thirst for knowledge, I am eager to learn and adapt to emerging technologies, programming languages, and development methodologies. My goal is to contribute to the development of cutting-edge software applications that have a tangible impact on people's lives, whether it be through enhancing efficiency, improving user experiences, or addressing societal challenges.  I aspire to become a skilled software engineer who can contribute to a team's success, drive technological advancements, and make a positive difference in the world of software development.

resume.skillmessage: With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, UX/UI design, ReactJS, MySQL, Java, Spring Boot, REST API, and proficiency in Visual Studio Code, Eclipse JEE, and Spring Tool Suite 3, I am skilled in creating captivating websites, developing scalable applications, designing intuitive user experiences, and managing efficient databases. My proficiency enables me to deliver high-quality solutions that provide exceptional user experiences.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

work.title: Frond-End Developer Intern
work.description:
Developed a highly interactive dashboard page designed to enhance user experience and improve navigation and data visualization.
 Utilized WordPress as the primary content management system, focusing on custom theme development and plugin integration to meet specific functional requirements.
 Collaborated closely with the UI/UX design team to implement user interface concepts, ensuring a seamless and responsive design across multiple devices.  
 Participated in the full lifecycle of web development, from initial concept and design through development, testing, optimization, and deployment, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
